text: Zoran Milanović (; born 30 October 1966) is a Croatian politician. In 2019, he became the 5th President of Croatia. He was the Prime Minister of Croatia from 2011 to 2016. He has also been the leader of the Social Democratic Party of Croatia (SDP). It is the largest centre-left political party in Croatia, since 2007. ==Notes== ==References== ==Other websites== * * Javno.com: Biography Category:1966 births Category:Living people Category:Presidents of Croatia Category:Current national leaders Category:Prime Ministers of Croatia Category:Politicians from Zagreb
title: Zoran Milanović
